name: Tailwind CSS Figma Library
description:
This is a Tailwind CSS (https://tailwindcss.com/) Figma library including all Tailwind colors, spacing component with variants for Auto Layout and often used text styles.


You can use the spacing component with the plugin https://www.figma.com/c/plugin/809099681305129697/Spacing-Manager.


Changelog


  • Update color names for Tailwind CSS v3.0 (2022.03.29)
